item.title: Atomic Notes
item.description: Atomic notes refer to ideas that are short and concise, but could also stand on their own without needing to refer to other ideas in order to make sense.

item.title: Becoming the 3% - Unpacking the One Metric
item.description: Becoming the 3% - Unpacking the One Metric The One Metric - P/L When you’re still learning to trade and yet to be profitable, finding out a way to check if you’re on the right track is super important to your future trading success.

item.title: Becoming the 3% – Part 1 – Strategy
item.description: Becoming the 3% – Part 1 – Strategy The game of probability Deep down at its core, trading is just like running a casino, it’s nothing but a game of probability.

item.title: Becoming the 3% – Part 2 – Risk Management
item.description: Becoming the 3% – Part 2 – Risk Management People always say survive before you thrive, for traders that’s particularly true.

item.title: Digital Garden
item.description: Digital Garden What is digital gardening? If you don’t know what digital gardens are, just think of it as a personal Wikipedia, the end goal isn’t a perfectly written article, instead the process of slowly growing the interconnected knowledge is what digital gardening cares about.
